data.name: Fallen Worlds
data.detailed_description:
Fallen worlds is a unique mix of action-RPG, hack 'n' slash, and roguelite elements, with a heavy emphasis on looting. It brings dungeon crawling to a new level with the best elements of your favorite RPG's and fantastic stylized graphics!

Save the Fallen Worlds!

As the last line of defense, it's your job to fight off demon armies in order to save each fallen world! Travel from one world to the next in each act and defeat the demon army general to save that world!

1-4 Players


Fight your way through hordes of demon armies alone or in a group of up to 4 players! The difficulty scales by the party size to keep things challenging!

Customize Ability Colors


Don't like the color of your abilities? Customize the looks of each ability to your favorite colors!

Diverse Fighting Styles


Each run is different! Every character was designed to have unique combat styles that you can control based on loot and a choice of starting skills! Want to turn your glass cannon Ice mage into a frosty tank? The choice is yours!

Collect Loot


Find loot from over a billion different rune combinations, allowing new passive skills and bonuses to influence your run! With 6 rarities, and a forge system that allows you to upgrade and reroll specific aspects of your runes, you can create the perfect setup for your chosen build.

Procedurally Generated Maps


Dodge a myriad of specialized enemy skills from fresh encounters that change from map to map. Staying true to the roguelike side of the game you will choose between randomized events on different worlds, randomized shrines with powerful boons that can change your run, and what run specific items to buy at a happenchance merchant.

Quick Gameplay


Don't have a lot of time to spend on games? Or maybe you're just tired of 90 minute roguelike escapades. Don't worry. Each expedition into the the corrupted worlds takes 25-35 minutes on average. Dive in to farm essence improving your strength, or carefully set up specific skills and modifiers to push a harder difficulty. You can even quit out of the run early when you're in between acts!

data.short_description: Fight off demon armies to save each of the fallen worlds in this fast-paced Action-RPG Roguelite. Play single-player or up to 4-player online co-op in procedurally generated maps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-3970X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
